Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Washington
ShortDescription: #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton, then resume their normal route on Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

Headline: #49B North Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Berwyn
ShortDescription: Northbound 49B North Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Berwyn,

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49B North Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Lincoln, Bryn Mawr and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Berwyn,

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
